Token.Abstract: Global directory manager that returns scoped directory. The scoping is enforced by taking into account the organizationId, the userId and the communityId.
Returns the singleton of this manager
Ensures the specified directory exists on the disk.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error on output or nil if no error is desired

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the directory exists or has been successfully created, NO otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Ensure the specified string contains only characters that can be safely used to identify a path on the disk.

Parameter.Name: candidate
Parameter.Abstract: The string to be checked for compatibility.

Token.Abstract: Returns the path to the directory type for the specified org, user and community.

Parameter.Name: orgId
Parameter.Abstract: The organization ID. If nil, this method returns the global directory type requested (eg Library/Caches)

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The user ID. If nil, this method returns the directory type requested, scoped at the org level (eg Library/Caches/<orgId>/)

Parameter.Name: communityId
Parameter.Abstract: The community ID. If nil, this method returns the directory type requested, scoped at the user level (eg Library/Caches/<orgId>/<userId>)

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type of directory to return (see NSSearchPathDirectory)

Parameter.Name: components
Parameter.Abstract: The additional path components to be added at the end of the directory (eg ['mybundle', 'common'])

Token.Abstract: Returns the path to the directory type for the specified user and scope

Parameter.Name: user
Parameter.Abstract: The user account to use. If nil, the path returned corresponds to the global path type

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type of directory to return (see NSSearchPathDirectory)

Parameter.Name: components
Parameter.Abstract: The additional path components to be added at the end of the directory (eg ['mybundle', 'common'])

Token.Abstract: Returns the path to the directory type for the specified user.

Parameter.Name: account
Parameter.Abstract: The user account to use. If nil, the path returned corresponds to the global path type

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type of directory to return (see NSSearchPathDirectory)

Parameter.Name: components
Parameter.Abstract: The additional path components to be added at the end of the directory (eg ['mybundle', 'common'])

Token.Abstract: Returns the path to the directory type for the current user and current community.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type of directory to return (see NSSearchPathDirectory)

Parameter.Name: components
Parameter.Abstract: The additional path components to be added at the end of the directory (eg ['mybundle', 'common'])

Token.Abstract: Returns the path to the global directory of the specified type. For example, NSCachesDirectory will return "Library/Caches/<bundleIdentifier>/"

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type of directory to return (see NSSearchPathDirectory)

Parameter.Name: components
Parameter.Abstract: The additional path components to be added at the end of the directory (eg ['mybundle', 'common'])
